1592770.name: Pecaminosa - Digital Artbook
1592770.description:
Pecaminosa's Artbook. We like to call it the "Dark Book", keeping in line with its relation with our in-game item, that is the key to starting off this (your) story written with humor, deception, misleadings and mysteries.

Welcome to Pecaminosa's backstage. Enjoy this art book and gain privileged access to concept art, artist's commentaries and... deep secrets.

Get to know how Pecaminosa's various characters evolved (from first sketches to final drafts) across 40 pages, and read detailed descriptions of how it was like to breathe life into this city raised with pixels, from the words of our own artists.
1592770.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
